alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 2:51PM MST until March 06 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON SATURDAY TO 8 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...From noon Saturday to 8 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected along all mountain routes Saturday, including higher passes along I-15, I-70, and Highway 6 over Soldier Summit. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of heavy snow will cross the area Saturday afternoon, with periods of snow lingering into the evening and overnight hours. Snowfall rates with this band may exceed 2 inches per hour in some locations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
